original_text: For, lo, he that formeth the mountains, and createth the wind, and declareth unto man what is his thought, that maketh the morning darkness, and treadeth upon the high places of the earth, The Lord, The God of hosts, is his name.
korean_text: 보라 산들을 지으며 바람을 창조하며 자기 뜻을 사람에게 보이며 아침을 어둡게 하며 땅의 높은 데를 밟는 이는 그의 이름이 만군의 하나님 여호와시니라

sentences.original_text: For, lo, he that formeth the mountains
and declareth unto man what is his thought
and treadeth upon the high places of the earth
The Lord, The God of hosts, is his name.
